snippet: Phony Twitter users like @NotBillWalton and @NotWaltFrazier are in playoff form as the N.B.A. season reaches its climax.
abstract: Imposter Twitter users, masquerading as basketball icons Walt Frazier and Bill Walton among others, shift into overdrive, skewering players, coaches, announcers and fans as the NBA season reaches its climax with the finals between Oklahoma City Thunder and Miami Heat.
lead_paragraph: Phony Twitter users like @NotBillWalton and @NotWaltFrazier are in playoff form as the N.B.A. season reaches its climax.

headline.seo: N.B.A. Finals - Impostors on Twitter Post Up
headline.main: Impostors Post Up in N.B.A. Finals
headline.print_headline: On Twitter, Impostors Post Up in the Finals
